name: Selected Markdown to Jira
description: With this script you can right click the selected text and convert it to Jira Code. Dependencies Node.js jira2md (installed via npm) Installation After you have installed Node.js you can install jira2md by typing: sudo npm install -g jira2md You might also need to set your NODE_PATH to the path where the module did get installed with for example: export NODE_PATH=/usr/local/lib/node_modules
